items.defaultValue: This watchface was developed by swansswansswansswanssosoft, a member of the Rebble community. Join the movement today! http://discord.gg/aRUAYFN

You can use this watchface to display the current and historical price of most cryptocurriences as well as most publicly traded stocks on the major exchanges. Unfortunately, real-time data is not currently available for stocks (it is always day old).

items.label: Asset Type
items.description: Declare which asset type you want to view; cryptocurrency or stock. You can configure both separately below.

items.label: Dither Style
items.description: This defines the fill appearance of the graph.

items.label: Alpha Vantage API Key
items.description: You need an API key from Alpha Vantage. You can get one for free here: https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key

items.label: Stock Symbol
items.description: Enter the stock symbol of your choice. Make sure the symbol is spelled correctly and does contain any extra characters like trailing white spaces. You can add pretty much any publicly traded equity from the major exchanges.

items.label: Price History Horizon
items.description: How far back do you want to see the price history? Price histories are always adjusted for splits.
